subject: Attention
body:
Attention  
This to inform you that we are waiting to hear from you for a long
time well, we have a technical problem with our other e-mail address,
that is why we missed communication with you, we want to inform you
that your compensation fund of $10.5Million dollars  is still here in
our bank on your name waiting for you to clear all the charges that
will enable you to receive all the important Legal documents  that
will enable you to sign and receive your compensation fund of
$10.5Million dollars in your account, Kindly  get back to us Urgent
because we have a very good arrangement now consigning the release of
your fund within 24hours in your account, kindly update us as soon as
possible
 Yours faithfully,
Mr. Hugh Sterling

subject: Re:   Attention
body:
Dear Mr. Hugh Sterling,

I am sorry for the delay in response. I was not aware of any funds being held in my name at your bank. Could you please provide more details about this? What are the charges that need to be cleared and how much is the fund?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Jonathan
